title: About
subtitle: About this site and Travis
intro: Travis is a web developer and he made a script that made this site.
body: <div id="hcard-Travis-Hardiman" class="vcard h-card">  <img src="http://www.gravatar.com/avatar/918aabb05e77cfa8e40d2a76a5168326?s=1024" alt="photo of Travis Hardiman" class="photo u-photo">  <h2><a class="url fn p-name u-url" href="http://travis.servebeer.com"><span class="p-given-name">Travis</span> <span class="p-family-name">Hardiman</span></a></h2>  <p class="adr"><span class="category p-nickname">Travis</span> is a <span class="category">web developer</span> who likes <span class="category">beer</span> and funny stuff. He lives in <span class="category locality p-locality">Rochester</span>, <span class="region p-region">NY</span><span class="country-name p-country-name">USA</span>.</p>  <ul>    <li><a href="https://github.com/dieseltravis">dieseltravis on github</a></li>    <li><a href="https://bitbucket.org/travishardiman">travishardiman on bitbucket</a></li>    <li><a href="https://keybase.io/trav">trav on keybase.io</a></li>    <li><a href="https://twitter.com/travis">@travis on twitter</a></li>    <li><a href="http://www.last.fm/user/diesel_travis">diesel_travis on last.fm</a></li>  </ul></div><h2>Traviblog</h2><p>Traviblog started out in 2002ish as an AIM Sub-Profile that I wrote using Classic ASP and Access. It was later migrated to a .Text blog which worked well for awhile. Then it was migrated to dasBlog which didn't work as well.</p><p>This site uses JSON for its data source to generate static files. I named the script <a href='https://github.com/dieseltravis/suo'>suo</a> because it was short, untaken, and latin is neat.</p>
